meanings.sent1: I was so geeked to go to the amusement park with my friends.
meanings.sent2: The children were geeked about the upcoming field trip to the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The puppy looked geeked when it saw its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: Her face lit up, geeked with joy, when she received the surprise gift.
meanings.sent5: The crowd's cheers filled the stadium, creating a geeked atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Under the influence of drugs or alcohol
meanings.sent1: He seemed geeked after having a few drinks at the party.
meanings.sent2: The actor's behavior on stage suggested he was geeked during the performance.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked geeked after accidentally ingesting some catnip.
meanings.sent4: The room felt geeked with the smell of alcohol and cigarettes.
meanings.sent5: The partygoers appeared geeked as they danced wildly under the disco lights.
